mapper.select: select no, name, category.desc, blog_id from category where blog_id=#{blog_id } order by no desc
SELECT a.no, a.name, a.desc, a.blog_id, count(b.category_no) as cnt FROM category as a LEFT JOIN post as b ON a.no = b.category_no GROUP BY b.category_no HAVING blog_id=#{blog_id } ORDER BY a.no asc
